languages.text: "Единственное наказание за подобный проступок — смерть, элантах. Ступивший на путь Сай'лантреш утрачивает свет навсегда".

traits.locale_text: "Единственное наказание за подобный проступок — смерть, эл'антар. Ступивший на путь Сай'лантреш утрачивает свет навсегда".

languages.text: "The only punishment for such a crime is death, elantach. The one who steps onto the path of Sai'lanthresh forfeits the light forever."
languages.original_text: "Единственное наказание за подобный проступок — смерть, элантах. Ступивший на путь Сай'лантреш утрачивает свет навсегда".

traits.locale_text: "The only punishment for such a crime is death, el'antar. The one who steps onto the path of Sai'lanthresh forfeits the light forever."
"The only punishment for such a crime is death, el'antar. The one who steps onto the path of Sai'lanthresh forfeits the light forever."
"The only punishment for such a crime is death, el'antar. The one who steps onto the path of Sai'lanthresh forfeits the light forever."
"The only punishment for such a crime is death, elantach. The one who steps onto the path of Sai'lanthresh forfeits the light forever."

languages.text: 「この罪にふさわしい罰は死のみだ、エランタ。セランスレッシュの道に踏み入った輩は、永遠に光を失う」
languages.original_text: "The only punishment for such a crime is death, elantach. The one who steps onto the path of Sai'lanthresh forfeits the light forever."

traits.locale_text: 「この罪にふさわしい罰は死のみだ、エランタ。セランスレッシュの道に踏み入った輩は、永遠に光を失う」

languages.text: “犯下了这样的罪行，唯一适合的惩罚就是死亡，外界人。所有踏上赛·兰斯雷什之路的人，都将永远与光明绝缘。”
languages.original_text: "The only punishment for such a crime is death, elantach. The one who steps onto the path of Sai'lanthresh forfeits the light forever."

traits.locale_text: “犯下了这样的罪行，唯一适合的惩罚就是死亡，外界人。所有踏上赛·兰斯雷什之路的人，都将永远与光明绝缘。”

languages.text: «El único castigo para semejante afrenta es la muerte, elantach. Quien emprende la senda de Sai'lanthresh renuncia a la luz por siempre jamás».
languages.original_text: "The only punishment for such a crime is death, elantach. The one who steps onto the path of Sai'lanthresh forfeits the light forever."

traits.locale_text: «El único castigo para semejante afrenta es la muerte, elantach. Quien emprende la senda de Sai'lanthresh renuncia a la luz por siempre jamás».

languages.text: "Die einzige Strafe für so ein Verbrechen ist der Tod, Elantach. Wer den Pfad von Sai'lanthresh betritt, schwört dem Licht für immer ab."
languages.original_text: "The only punishment for such a crime is death, elantach. The one who steps onto the path of Sai'lanthresh forfeits the light forever."

traits.locale_text: "Die einzige Strafe für so ein Verbrechen ist der Tod, Elantach. Wer den Pfad von Sai'lanthresh betritt, schwört dem Licht für immer ab."

languages.text: « Il n'y a qu'une seule punition possible pour ce genre de crime, elantach : la mort. Il suffit d'un pas sur la voie de Sai'lanthresh pour renoncer à tout jamais à la lumière. »
languages.original_text: "The only punishment for such a crime is death, elantach. The one who steps onto the path of Sai'lanthresh forfeits the light forever."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y a qu'une seule punition possible pour ce genre de crime, elantach : la mort. Il suffit d'un pas sur la voie de Sai'lanthresh pour renoncer à tout jamais à la lumière. »

languages.text: "Böyle bir suçun tek cezası ölümdür elantach. Sai'lanthresh'in yolunu yol bellemiş kişi, ışığı bir daha göremez."
languages.original_text: "The only punishment for such a crime is death, elantach. The one who steps onto the path of Sai'lanthresh forfeits the light forever."

traits.locale_text: "Böyle bir suçun tek cezası ölümdür elantach. Sai'lanthresh'in yolunu yol bellemiş kişi, ışığı bir daha göremez."
